name: TREX ENTERPRISES CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Trex is encouraging governments around the world to adopt radar on their major airport runways in order to minimize damage and/or loss of life due to Foreign Objects on runways, i.e., wrench/nut/bolt/

Trex is encouraging governments around the world to adopt radar on their major airport runways in order to minimize damage and/or loss of life due to Foreign Objects on runways, i.e., wrench/nut/bolt/
Observing for foreign objects on runways. Receiving the cost of damage to aircraft by foreign objects on commercial and military runways.
Observing for foreign objects on runways. Receiving the cost of damage to aircraft by foreign objects on commercial and military runways.
Foreign object detection on runways. Informing all stakeholders about the ability to quickly and easily detect foreign objects on runways that would cause damage to an aircraft.
